data.name: VR PingPong Sweetie
data.detailed_description:
With the development of science and technology, intelligent AI is becoming more and more popular, and there are intelligent AI in all walks of life.
This is a training game for Ping-pong lovers, using the game features of VR to allow players to ignore the training ground and space.
We have prepared a variety of difficulties to meet the needs of fans of different levels to play.

You only need to win more balls than the sparring robot arm within the specified time to win.

game instructions:

Hit the ball by swinging the right handle
data.about_the_game:
With the development of science and technology, intelligent AI is becoming more and more popular, and there are intelligent AI in all walks of life.
This is a training game for Ping-pong lovers, using the game features of VR to allow players to ignore the training ground and space.

You only need to win more balls than the sparring robot arm within the specified time to win.

game instructions:

Hit the ball by swinging the right handle
data.short_description: This is a VR game that simulates table tennis in real life, which can be trained with the sparring robotic arm. to improve your table tennis level.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
